com.github.mrm1st3r.cards.lobby

Class LobbyCreateActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.github.mrm1st3r.cards.lobby.LobbyCreateActivity

  • public class LobbyCreateActivity
extends Activity
    This activity will create a new Bluetooth server socket and wait for incoming connections.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Lukas 'mrm1st3r' Taake

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
